name: Henry Esco
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
Hello my name is Henry Esco and I'm replying to the budtender position I have over 10 years of experience in the marijuana industry I've dealt with companies such as heavy hitters  liquid gold and medicated cups as well have worked storefront in MMJ shops in SFV I have an extensive knowledge of concentrates and edibles different types of vapes in the industry along with the know-how of all active strains in the marijuana industry my qualifications are more that of that a basic budtender. I am reliable punctual hard working very skilled individual that works well with others.
Henry Esco 
(818) 939-6357
